mapper.select: SELECT w.wishlist_id, w.user_no, w.accommodation_id, w.created_at, a.name, a.price_per_night, (SELECT p.photo_path FROM tbl_accommodation_photos p WHERE p.accommodation_id = w.accommodation_id AND ROWNUM = 1) AS photo_path FROM tbl_wishlist w JOIN tbl_accommodations a ON w.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE w.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY w.created_at DESC
